meanings.sent1: The prenotification about the meeting helped everyone prepare.
meanings.sent2: We received a prenotification about the upcoming maintenance work.
meanings.sent3: The prenotification of the surprise party almost ruined the surprise!
meanings.sent4: Her early arrival was a prenotification of the exciting news to come.
meanings.sent5: The prenotification of the storm made everyone take precautions.

meanings.definition: The act of notifying in advance.
meanings.sent1: His prenotification of the schedule change was appreciated by all.
meanings.sent2: The prenotification of the event details helped us plan our day.
meanings.sent3: The prenotification of the pop quiz made everyone nervous.
meanings.sent4: The prenotification of the price increase shocked many customers.
meanings.sent5: The prenotification of the surprise visitor made everyone excited.
